thread.title: rainbow-hued light labyrinth by brut deluxe forms an immersive infinity room in china
thread.title_full: rainbow-hued light labyrinth by brut deluxe forms an immersive infinity room in china

author: nina azzarello I designboom
title: rainbow-hued light labyrinth by brut deluxe forms an immersive infinity room in china
text:
rainbow-hued light labyrinth by brut deluxe forms an immersive infinity room in china jan 17, 2017 rainbow-hued light labyrinth by brut deluxe forms an immersive infinity room in china 

as part of the luneng sanya bay light and art festival in hainan, china, architecture and design studio brut deluxe has created an immersive light maze that surrounds visitors in a prismatic and dynamic abyss. ‘yǔzhòu’ has been built using 2.5 meter high acrylic glass panels with dichroic film glued to one side. this turns the semi-transparent walls into reflective sheets that shift light rays across the color range of a rainbow. as viewers move through the installation, the hues gradate from cool blues and greens, to vibrant pink and orange tones.
